name: SUNE
description:
Little VN made on the last week of the NaNoRenO2020 as a way of learning how to use fungus. Some little problems with the GUI but proud about it overall :)

If you liked it you can follow me at
Twitter: @ZLTM_david

You can aslo contact me at: jdavidrevillad@gmail.com

Inspired by:
SCP and the SCP game jam

Art assets by:

Special thanks to red-baby, great sprites!
https://red-baby.itch.io/

https://ayaemo.skr.jp/material_office.html
